All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Application
The entry point of the Spring Boot application.
Card
Contains all necessary formatting that makes each Card have usable information coded into it
expectedBet
Calculates the recommended bet multiplier, recommended bet, and the expected bank balance of the user after a specified number of hands while using the recommended multiplier & bet.
Game
Contains all necessary formatting in order for a proper game of Blackjack to be played
InitialPredictionOutcome
Creates an initial prediction of the hand outcome given the player's hand and the dealer's up-card
MainLayout
Creates a viewer-friendly user interface that allows for a blackjack game to be played
Suggestion
Gives the user a suggested action (hit, stand, split, double down)
test
